dct_title_s: Old Map of the Continent according to the greatest diametrical length from the point of East Tartary to the Cape of Good Hope
dct_description_sm: Possible engraver's mistake in the title. "Old Map of the Continent" should be " Map of the Old Continent ... "
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work has been identified as being free of known restrictions under copyright law, including all related and neighboring rights. You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
